data.name: Student Aide - Mohammed Ajao #2 TicTacNuisance
data.description:
Enter to the arena for a challenge young warrior. You will create a simple TicTacToeBoard from scratch or visualize it through arrays! This is a great way to visualize arrays. Try making a TicTacToeBoard and picturing how arrays work.

- Ensure TicTacToeBoard() returns a multi-dimensional array
- Ensure tthe function can interperet [A1, A2, A3],  [B1, B2, B3] and [C1, C2, C3] to search the array
- The returned Array should have the letter passed into it into the position with A being row 1 and A1 being row 1, column 1. 

Make sure you use research if you are unsure about arrays. I have given you 50% of the solution, the other half is up to you! Carry on to victory!
